Research

Ability to unlock perks. Which path will you take?
BACK


Researcher Points: 0

You may select a path you wish to research in. The more research points you have, the more perks you have access to for that path. You may not have all paths active at the same time, and can only be switched every 2 weeks.
Select your path wisely. You may examine the perks by clicking on the criptoe icons in the table.

Dwarf path is now unlocked permanently.
Nature path is now unlocked permanently.
Chemist path is now unlocked permanently.
Sea path is now unlocked permanently.

CRIPTOE GUIDE

CRIPTOE GUIDE



Criptoe is an in-game currency that can be purchased with regular coins. It can then be invested in different markets, for which your payout will be positive or negative.

Key points:

    Criptoe currency can be used to purchase items.
    You can buy criptoe only once a day.
    You can invest criptoe in four different investment wallets.
    You can only add investments during weekdays (Monday - Friday).




    You MUST! take out your criptoe from investment before Sunday, If not it will be automatically taken out, at a loss.
    Taking out critpoe from a wallet will lock it until the week is over. This means you won't be able to invest after Sunday passes.

Robot Waves

SELECT YOUR CHALLENGE

You can only challenge robot waves every 24h as I need to charge their batteries after they fight.

ROOKIE

Fight 5 robots in a row. You will fully regenerate hp and mana every fight.
Completed: 0

   

WARRIOR

Fight 5 robots in a row. You will not regenerate hp or mana between fights.
Completed: 0

   

MASTER

Fight 10 robots in a row. You will fully regenerate hp and mana after the fifth fight.
Robots will have double HP.
Completed: 0

   

ELITE

Fight 15 robots in a row. You will not never regenerate health or mana.
Completed: 0

   

GRAND MASTER

Fight the final boss.
Completed: 0


Robot List
WAVE ONE This wave has nothing special.
WAVE TWO Will eventually bring his arm up, followed by a powerful lightning attack. This should be reflected.
WAVE THREE Heals over max HP ever tick. You'll need to hit higher than his max HP to kill this one. Usually can be done with critical hits.
WAVE FOUR This wave has nothing special.
WAVE FIVE Flying up in the air, this robot can only be targeted with arrows or magic. Use your highest damage arrows for a quicker fight.
WAVE SIX Extremely weak to scythe. The haunted bow does not have any special effects.
WAVE SEVEN Extremely weak to fire damage.
WAVE EIGHT This robot will attack every tick with blood magic. Kill it as quick as possible.
WAVE NINE This robot cowardly hiding behind the tank will charge up and quickly fire cannonballs at you. You must react fast, and he will charge multiple times per fight. Like the quest, the cannon can also be damaged via poison. Magic does not work on this wave.
WAVE TEN After a few seconds, it will begin to rain. A rain potion might be required here, depending on how much HP you have.
WAVE ELEVEN This robot will randomly alter between ice and fire. When the robot turns into ice, use fire damage. If the robot goes up in flames, use ice damage. The robot will alter between states randomly, sometimes very quickly. It is not predictable.
WAVE TWELVE This robot has extremely high defence. Defenders might be useful here.
WAVE THIRTEEN This robot is very weak to the battleaxe. This weapon can be assembled using the invention skill.
WAVE FOURTEEN Will eventually bring his arm up, followed by a powerful lightning attack. This should be reflected or avoided. The reaction time here is very important and may charge multiple times a fight, sometimes one after another.

ODD ONE OUT
Goal: Find the heaviest weight.

You are presented with 9 weights where 8 weigh the same, and one is heavier than the others.

Place 6 weights (3 on each side of the balance, from left to right) by clicking on them in the order you want. You may only get the results from the balance twice. After using the balance twice, you can select the weight you think is the heaviest.

Note that you can reset this puzzle anytime by x-ing out.

THE FINAL FIGHT?

Rubbing the forest crystal will heal and increase your max HP based on basic attacks from faradox for 1 minute.
